type.description: The type of the target incident. Must be 'extendedIncidents' or 'incidents'.

incidentId.description: The ID of the incident to update.

status.description: The status to be assigned to the incident. Possible values are: 1 - Open, 2 - Investigating, 3 - Closed, 4 - False positive.

description: Update the status of an incident
name: Update the status of an incident

result.description: This method returns a Boolean which is True if the operation was successful.
